name: Shital
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the blessings of God always be with you and fill your life with joy and success! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, dear Shital! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special, and your birthday is a day to celebrate the amazing person you are.
outroText: May your birthday be filled with love, laughter, and cherished moments. Have a fantastic day!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
